abstract: NBC’s coverage of the “U.S. Olympic Trials” gave the network a boost in the ratings on Sunday, making it No. 1 for the night among adults 18 to 49.
snippet: NBC’s coverage of the “U.S. Olympic Trials” gave the network a boost in the ratings on Sunday, making it No. 1 for the night among adults 18 to 49.
lead_paragraph: NBC’s coverage of the “U.S. Olympic Trials” gave the network a boost in the ratings on Sunday, making it No. 1 for the night among adults 18 to 49. According to Nielsen’s estimates, the women’s gymnastics contenders put NBC in the lead in that demographic during the 7 and 8 p.m. hours despite averaging only a modest audience of 6.2 million total viewers.

headline.main: Sunday Ratings: Olympic Trials Boost NBC
